body:
The lounge is a place to discuss with the members of the community anything related to Avicus!

Be sure to put topics about Avicus games specifically in the "Game Discussion" category and feedback or suggestions should go in the "Server Feedback" category.

If you have screenshots to share, events to discuss or anything else that does not fit into other categories, post it here.

title: Welcome to the Lounge!
